lead_paragraph: Ireland, the defending champion, was left battered by a 10-9 loss at France in the Six Nations competition, Ireland’s first defeat against France in five years.

headline.main: A Painful Loss for Ireland at Six Nations

snippet: Ireland, the defending champion, was left battered by a 10-9 loss at France in the Six Nations competition, Ireland’s first defeat against France in five years.
abstract: Ireland loses to France, 10-9, in Six Nations competition, their first loss to French in five years.
